entry.title: learn the hard way
entry.summary:
Author: torturedslothdepartment

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,461Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 19

Summary: Evan knows he should feel bad. He knows that he's supposed to feel like the world is crashing down, that this was about to destroy lives and change things in what could possibly be the worst way. He knows this will piss people off in his life, possibly in ways that he might never be forgiven for. His own sister might even stop talking to him. He'll probably have to leave the 118. Eddie will definitely never forgive him. He should feel guilty. And yet. All he feels is relief. - Buck starts a relationship with Eddie after he and Christopher move back from Texas.But that doesn't mean that Evan isn't still in deep with Tommy.

entry.title: The sky could fall on me (But you mean more to me)
entry.summary:
Author: WhisperingHope

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 43,082Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 149

Summary: Evan Buckley has the worst luck. He knows it. His team knows it. Maddie dealt with it his entire upbringing. It‚Äôs become a simple fact of life. The sky is blue, grass is green, and Evan Buckley has god-awful luck. If a crushed leg (due to toppled fire truck), a pulmonary embolism at the ripe age of 27, being caught in a tsunami with his best friend‚Äôs son, and an honest to god lightning strike weren‚Äôt enough proof of the matter, stepping on a bomb is all the confirmation he really didn‚Äôt need.Edmundo Diaz has faced far too much death in his lifetime to be afraid of it. In fact, he‚Äôs spent most of his life staring down the barrel of a gun, metaphorically and physically. Quite honestly, Santa Muerte himself could appear before Eddie‚Äôs very eyes and he would just count it as another Tuesday. So being in close proximity to a live explosive? Not even the worst thing he‚Äôs had to deal with in recent years. Really, not even the worst thing he's had to deal with this week. But his best friend standing on the trigger? Eddie‚Äôs never been afraid of death. Until he found himself standing between it and his best friend.

entry.title: What do you think this is?
entry.summary:
Author: rotisserie_marie_chicken

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,016Chapters: 9/9Kudos: 449

Summary: Bobby slaps both gloved palms against the glass. ‚ÄúWhat are you saying, Buck?‚ÄùBuck doesn‚Äôt reply. He won‚Äôt meet Bobby‚Äôs eyes. He bows his head a little, reaching for the latch on his helmet.‚ÄúBuck!‚Äù Cold dread spills into the sockets of all of Bobby‚Äôs joints. ‚ÄúWhat are you doing!‚ÄùBuck fumbles to release the lock, but he gets it on the second try.‚ÄúPut your helmet back on! Kid!‚Äù-OR-Embark with me on an angsty journey as we imagine a universe in which it was not Bobby who was infected with CCHF, but Buck. That means Buck was stuck inside with the team in 8x14 and 8x15 while Bobby was running around outside with Athena. And Buck didn't tell anyone he'd been exposed. Let‚Äôs assume everything else is the same. Oh, except no one‚Äôs dying this time because I said so.
